name: Rundeck Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Rundeck Tool 节点。主要用于: Manage Rundeck API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Manage Rundeck API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: job

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: execute
available_options: Get Metadata (值: getMetadata) - Get metadata of a job

jobid.name: jobid
jobid.description: The job ID to get metadata off
jobid.natural_language_description: 参数名: Job ID | 作用: The job ID to get metadata off | (必填项)

arguments.name: arguments
arguments.natural_language_description: 参数名: Arguments | 默认值: {}

filter.name: filter
filter.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filter | 作用: Filter Rundeck nodes by name
